conversation.content:
I will provide an utterance and your task is to identify the intents and entities present based on the descriptions in the provided schema. The text provided might match multiple intents, in which case, you should output all matching intents. Some entities may not be present in the text or may not meet the requirements in the schema. In this case, do not include those entities in the output. If an entity contains a "rule", that rule must be followed exactly. "Similar values" on the other hand gives examples of that entity but is not an exhaustive list and valid values may not be included. 

Your output should be a YAML with matching intents as keys and values of dictionaries of entities. Keys are IDs - not names. Values are the entity extracted. 

Text: when i use chrome on my laptop it runs so slow and i cant load anything so i turned off the wifi and now my computer does not connect to the internet at all i dont know whats going on
